channel.title: Bibliotek on Min side
channel.description: Recent content in Bibliotek on Min side

item.title: The Jungle
item.description: An exposé of the conditions on the Chicago Stockyards in 1906

item.title: To Paradise
item.description: A novel spanning three centuries and three different versions of the American experiment

item.title: A Pipeline Runs Through It
item.description: The story of oil from ancient times to the first world war

item.title: Den forsvundne fuldmægtig
item.description: Satire over vanemenneskets afhængighed af den borgerlige tilværelses konvention og disciplin.

item.title: The Utopia of Rules: On Technology, Stupidity, and the Secret Joys of Bureaucracy
item.description: Where does the desire for endless rules, regulations, and bureaucracy come from? How did we come to spend so much of our time filling out forms? And is it really a cipher for state violence?.
